info.name: Workona Dark Theme
info.additionalInfo: # Changelog | **Date** | **Version** | **Changes** | |-------------------|-------------|-------------| | 30 October 2020 | v0.5 | Darken backgrounds of sidebar pop-ups (e.g. the recommend to friends pop-up) | | 30 October 2020 | v0.4 | Make the tab list handle (used to re-order the tabs) visible (it is still not quite visible, however, I could not make it more visible) | | 30 October 2020 | v0.3 | Fixed tab selection (the checkboxes), tab moving dialogue and undoing dialogue | | 24 October 2020 | v0.2 | Minor fixes | | 24 October 2020 | v0.1 | Initial version | This is the first time I create and publish s user style. It definitely isnâ€™t perfect, but it suits my needs (darken the theme to avoid blinding my eyes). Tested on Firefox only. If someone whats to contribute, feel free to raise an issue or create a merge/pull request at GitLab.com. --- Changelog of WDT v0.5: - Darken backgrounds of sidebar pop-ups (e.g. the recommend to friends pop-up).
